[Property("FirstName", NotNull = true, Length = 30), ValidateLength(1, 30, "'First Name' can only be 30 characters long"), ValidateNotEmpty("'First name' is a required field")] public string FirstName { get { return firstname; } set { firstname = value; } }
When doing this, I got the following messages if I leave the FirstName empty:
'First name' is a required field 'First Name' can only be 30 characters long
This is boring, the message should be 'First name' is a required field if I leave it empty.
And 'First Name' can only be 30 characters long if the user input too long
